response.summary:
Principal Consultant and Market Leader of Major Developments & Events at Steer, with more than seven years of experience in the field of transportation engineering and planning, traffic engineering and modelling, choice modelling, mobility, and infrastructure. Enthusiastic about sustainable transport and smart mobility, behaviour change, transport demand management, and logistics. I help governments, decision-makers, policymakers, developers, and investors to shape the future of transport and cities; that is, to foster liveable cities and help build a more sustainable future. 

My experience involves a broad range of mobility-related projects in several countries which have provided me with a deep understanding of the mobility systems of regions and cities. Learning about these complexities, these projects have equipped me with first-rate technical, leadership and interpersonal abilities.

As project manager and technical expert, I am  responsible for managing projects and proposals related to transport in a broad perspective and scope  , involving multidisciplinary and international team coordination as well as direct client relationships. The projects varied from design micro-mobility schemes for large cities to analysing the market of electric versus diesel buses in several countries and advising city governments in matters of fleet replacement based on cost models and sustainable objectives.

My academic background includes a BSc in Civil Engineering, a diploma in Traffic, Road Design and Road Safety, and an MSc in Transportation Engineering, with a master thesis titled "Development of a Logistics Performance Index  for the analysis of the Colombian Altillanura". Technical skills include proficiency in Vissim, Stata, Lighthouse Studio (Sawtooth software), AutoCAD, and Microsoft Office Suite, among others.
response.skills: Ingeniería civil, Ingeniería del tráfico, Microsimulación, Gestión de proyectos, Microsoft Office, Liderazgo, Administración y dirección de empresas, Servicio de atención al cliente, AutoCAD, Trabajo en equipo, Planeamiento de proyectos, Ingeniería, Microsoft Excel, Planificación estratégica, Inglés, Transporte, Liderazgo de equipos, Investigación y desarrollo, Sostenibilidad, Microsoft PowerPoint

education.degree_name: Especialización en Tránsito, Diseño y Seguridad Vial

company.name: IDOM Consulting, Engineering, Architecture
company.description:
IDOM is a leading multinational company providing professional services in consulting, engineering and architecture. One of its competitive advantages is the exceptional level of commitment it offers its clients, accompanying them through all phases of their projects.

Since its foundation in 1957, IDOM has worked on all five continents, carefully maintaining its independence from financial or interest groups, thus guaranteeing independence and impartiality in the global services delivered.

With a team of more than 5,000 professionals of 70 different nationalities, IDOM has the capacity and expertise to tackle complex large-scale projects with a multidisciplinary approach.

IDOM is an employee-owned organization with 968 partners form all areas and levels of the company. This ownership structure creates a culture of engagement and collaboration, breaking down the barriers of operating in a global market.
